title: sollycak
author: sollycak
content: Hi, I am new to Bitcoin and wallets but manged to send bitcoin to my Electrum wallet with no problem. But when using it to send a payment, when I click the 'Pay' button a popup window says,  Error - No Output.I have no idea what this mean and have searched for answer but found nothing. The address is correct and amount.Anyone know what's causing this? Thanks

comments.author: Husna QA
comments.body: Quote from: sollycak on November 23, 2022, 08:09:47 PMHi, I am new to Bitcoin and wallets but manged to send bitcoin to my Electrum wallet with no problem. But when using it to send a payment, when I click the 'Pay' button a popup window says,  Error - No Output.I have no idea what this mean and have searched for answer but found nothing. The address is correct and amount.Anyone know what's causing this? ThanksMake sure the address you are sending Bitcoins to is correct.Also, the amount of BTC you send is not too small (check the units you use in Electrum). https://bitcoinelectrum.com/frequently-asked-questions/#why-am-i-getting-the-error-message-dust-outputs.Or try changing the electrum server (Tools-Network).Or if it still doesn't work, try looking at the error details in the debug logs (https://github.com/spesmilo/electrum-docs/blob/master/faq.rst#how-to-enable-debug-logging).

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: Quote from: sollycak on November 23, 2022, 08:09:47 PMwhen I click the 'Pay' button a popup window says,  Error - No Output.The address is correct and amount.The only case I can think of that it shows this error message[1] is when you forget to enter the address in the Pay to field like the picture below:https://github.com/spesmilo/electrum/blob/df2d0f4e1fc24267a0e3ea256ebf8356f30add6d/electrum/gui/qt/send_tab.py#L598-L599

comments.author: nc50lc
comments.body: Quote from: pooya87 on November 24, 2022, 04:02:30 AMThe only case I can think of that it shows this error message[1] is when you forget to enter the address in the Pay to field like the picture below:It can also happen if he forget to put an amount:Such thing can happen if he accidentally pasted either the address or amount in the "Description" instead of the dedicated text boxes.

comments.author: sollycak
comments.body: Thanks guys for the help. I managed to get it to work, although not sure what is was!
